about_the_game:
The legendary artifact dimension hourglass has undergone a mutation! Regions and heroes from all dimensions have come here because of the pull of the artifact...... Play as your respective hero and compete with your friends on the board to see who will reach the finish line first.

Dice the dice and use your hero skills to sprint as hard as you want and trap your friends!

The game supports 2-6 players, so don't worry if you're just one person, you can find strangers in the lobby to play with......
detailed_description:
The legendary artifact dimension hourglass has undergone a mutation! Regions and heroes from all dimensions have come here because of the pull of the artifact...... Play as your respective hero and compete with your friends on the board to see who will reach the finish line first.

Dice the dice and use your hero skills to sprint as hard as you want and trap your friends!

The game supports 2-6 players, so don't worry if you're just one person, you can find strangers in the lobby to play with......
name: 次元沙漏的棋盘 Dimensional Racing Board

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct3D compatible video card with 128MB memory or more
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card

short_description: It is a turn-based board fantasy role-playing game. You play as heroes from different dimensions to race against your friends on the board to see who reaches the finish line first. The rule is easy. The player who crosses the finish line first wins.
